abstract: Agencies are being asked to cut 2 percent from their budgets for the current fiscal year, which ends in June 2012, and 6 percent from proposed budgets for the following fiscal year.
snippet: Agencies are being asked to cut 2 percent from their budgets for the current fiscal year, which ends in June 2012, and 6 percent from proposed budgets for the following fiscal year.

headline.main: City Agencies Are Told to Cut Costs by $2 Billion
